entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
